item.title: Giubbe rosse
item.description: Giubbe rosse / Red Coats is a 1975 Italian adventure film co-written and directed by Joe D'Amato. It is part of a brief series of films that tried to market the commercial success of Lucio Fulci's White Fang presenting very similar plots and settings. D'Amato co-wrote the film with writer/actor Luigi Montefiori, who went on to star in a dozen or more D'Amato films.

item.title: Buffalo Bill, Hero of the Far West
item.description: Buffalo Bill, Hero of the Far West is a 1964 Italian spaghetti western directed by Mario Costa.

item.title: One Dollar Too Many
item.description: One Dollar Too Many is a 1968 Spaghetti Western feature film directed by Enzo G. Castellari and starring Antonio Sabàto, John Saxon, and Frank Wolff.

item.title: Ace High
item.description: Ace High is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed and written by Giuseppe Colizzi and starring Terence Hill, Bud Spencer and Eli Wallach. The film is the second in a trilogy started with God Forgives... I Don't! and ended with Boot Hill.

item.title: Gunman Sent by God
item.description: Gunman Sent by God is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Giorgio Ferroni and starring Anthony Steffen.

item.title: Pride and Vengeance
item.description: Man, Pride and Vengeance, also known as With Django Comes Death, is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Luigi Bazzoni and starring Franco Nero. The film is a spaghetti western version of the novella Carmen by Prosper Mérimée.

item.title: Kill or Be Killed
item.description: Kill or Be Killed is a 1966 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Tanio Boccia.

item.title: God Forgives... I Don't!
item.description: God Forgives... I Don't! is a 1967 Spaghetti Western film directed and written by Giuseppe Colizzi. The film is the first in a trilogy followed by Ace High and ended with Boot Hill.

item.title: Train for Durango
item.description: Train for Durango is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Mario Caiano.

item.title: The Ruthless Four
item.description: The Ruthless Four is a 1968 Western film directed by Giorgio Capitani and starring Van Heflin.
